overview: The widely expected micro movie Gift of Time to commemorate 45th Anniversary of China-Malaysia Diplomatic Relations unveils today. This movie elaborates and reviews the long-standing and heart-warming #ChinaMalaysiaRelationship​ from the perspective of the brotherhood and friendship. We sincerely celebrate the special moment with this precious gift, and believe that the bilateral relationship between two countries will shine with timeless beauty.
title: 时间的礼物
